title: Quick As May Be (4U53)
text:
Set:	The Two Towers
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Dwarven
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Maneuver: Spot a Dwarf companion and an Elf companion to wound a minion.
Lore:	”'I think, nonetheless, that we no longer need any trail to tell us which way to go.'”
Rarity:	U
